#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
int main()
{
    int t,n,temp,s,d;
 
      scanf("%d",&t);
      while(t--){
 
        scanf("%d",&n);
        temp = n;
s = 0;
        while(temp){
                d = temp%10;
                temp/=10;
                s = s + d;
        }
        printf("%0.0f\n",n*pow(2,s));
      }
return 0;
}
